title: (x) "Born To Kill" on Full Metal Jacket helmet - hand drawn {Yves}
content:
hi guys, I'm in desperate need to identify the font used in the writing on the helmet for the poster Full Metal Jacket - the text of the font I want says "BORN TO KILL". If any of you jedi masters could assist me I'd greatly appreciate it. Here's a pic

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [poster\_under\_licence.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201651/http:/typophile.com/files/poster_under_licence.gif) | 43 bytes |
author: treefrog

comments.content: That's actually is real hand writing, so there is no font unfortunately.

You mean there were no phototypesetters in the jungles of Vietnam? :^P

- Lex
